name: png-info
description: Get information about a PNG from its headers

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run cover
scripts.cover: istanbul cover --report cobertura --print detail tape -- test/index.tap.js test/**/*.tap.js
scripts.view-cover: istanbul cover --report html tape -- test/index.tap.js test/**/*.tap.js && opn coverage/index.html

author: Willyham <willdemaine@gmail.com>
